manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How many games are built-in in the TF card? 821 in the game list, 300 games none repeat, we added repeated games names for the players to add their own ROMs. Check out the following QA of how to add my own ROMs Can I download roms my own? Yes, download the roms that end with .nes, read the TF card on computer, rename the file with the exact format in the TF card, replace any file, for exacmple 1.nes, change the file name GM123.NES, drag it in TF card, replace the file GM123.NES How long are the cables The controller cable 4.5 feet. The HDMI cable is 4.9 feet. Are the games pixeled? Well, this game console is somehow smoothen the games, like rendering, the color is brighter but less pixeled. Is the game easy to find the one I want to play? D-pad up and down to select the games, left and right to flip pages. A and B flip 3 pages in 1 time. R1 and L1 works the same as A and B button.

Tough Cubic Built to Last, Service You Can Trust. At Tough Cubic, we rekindle the magic of retro gaming. Our consoles embody nostalgia with unwavering durability. We're not just about hardware; we cherish your gaming memories. Count on us for top-notch service and support. Where vintage meets resilience, and your gaming memories are valued.

HDMI Plug & Play Experience seamless entertainment with our game console featuring hassle-free HDMI output. Connecting to your TV is a breeze, ensuring a plug-and-play experience like no other. Immerse yourself in your favorite games and relive the nostalgia with the simplicity of HDMI connectivity.

Double the Fun: Two Players, One Screen! Game On: Your 2-Player TV Gaming Adventure Begins! Experience the pure joy of two-player gaming on our console. Picture this: you and your buddy or family member, huddled around the TV, laughing, competing, and reliving the classic games you both love. It's all about creating unforgettable moments and having a blast together. Get ready to bond over nostalgia and endless fun!

Classic Gamepad Rediscover the joy of classic gaming with our nostalgic gamepad. Better yet, we provide two gamepads, so you can dive into 2-player games with friends or family. It's all about bringing back those treasured gaming moments and creating new ones together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as expected!
reviews.reviewText: Took a while to get it working but works as expected. Lots of games wish I could save progress in a game. Thanks for a fun product so I can relive fun times with my kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work on all 5 of my tvs
reviews.reviewText: I plugged it in to 5 different tvs in my home and it wouldn’t even turn on on any of them. My kids were super excited to try it. I’m bummed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nostalgia at its finest
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for those nostalgic days that you want to show the younger generations what the old games were like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ya got me..
reviews.reviewText: Funny how it looks like a Super Nintendo.. but doesn’t have a single Super Nintendo game on the sd card. Very disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars What actually is this?
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try this, hoping I could get to play a classic game from my childhood, maybe even a knock-off Nintendo game... But alas, all i got to play were broken games that seem like they made last week using Unity and some sloppy vector art. None of the keys made sense. All the buttons were the right flipper while down on the D-Pad is the left flipper in the terrible pinball game. "821 Retro Games"? I only counted 60. I'm very disappointed. Tease me with the SNES looking system only to shove terrible games into it... NOt worth more than $10 imo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mini Super Nintendo is straight from the 90s! It comes with two controllers and over 100 preloaded games on it. Easy to install and set up, you’ll be playing SuperMario in minutes! Great gift idea!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars make sure to use SD card for full selection.
reviews.reviewText: This mock Nintendo NES game system has preloaded games on a mini look alike console. The important thing is to make sure to insert the mini SD card into the back of the console. Otherwise, you are stuck with a poor selection of 60 no-name games. Once the SD is installed, you have over 800. The system of selecting the games is not particularly convenient, and you can scroll one screen at a time with the arrow pad, or skip by 50's or so with the buttons, but then you are missing a lot. One could wish for a way of sorting or searching the games, but in reality there are probably a dozen or so you may want to play for nostalgia sake. The fact that you can't back out of a game to the home menu except by the reset button, is also a little annoying. However, if you find the games you like, the controls and concept is still the same as the classic console. The cords were a little short to reach where we needed, and so the device kept falling. Overall, it's average--a fun throwback, but some simple improvements could really make a better user experience. If you are patient with those, and identify which games you really want to play, it can be fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was as advertised
reviews.reviewText: It is what I thought don’t forget about the SD card in the box and put it in the system. I wrote a bad review and I am changing it to reflect correctly. I forget how bad the graphics were but was still nostalgic to see.
